post.date: Posted: Wed Aug 23, 2006 7:52 am Post subject: Create cm file.
post.author: mxkash
post.body: I have ase file. How create cm file?

post.date: Posted: Wed Aug 23, 2006 12:56 pm Post subject:
post.author: Bittoman
post.body:
Load D3/Q4Radiant (either one works) then load the model into the editor and with the model selected click Selection -> Export -> .cm

That will place a .cm file of the same name as your model in the model's folder.

post.date: Posted: Wed Aug 23, 2006 2:14 pm Post subject:
post.author: mxkash
